content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area (Position x=0-2, y=0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace at (0,0) - currently empty
- Furnace at (2,0) - has 1 iron plate in output

### Copper Smelting Area (Position x=4-6, y=4)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace at (4,4) - has 22 copper plates in output
- Furnace at (6,4) - has 13 copper plates in output

### Inserter Assembly Line (Position x=20-27, y=2.5)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (26.5, 2.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (23.5, 2.5) for crafting inserters
- Output wooden chest at (20.5, 2.5) containing 121 inserters
- Two burner inserters:
  - At (21.5, 2.5) moving items from assembler to output chest
  - At (25.5, 2.5) moving items from input chest to assembler

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to 4.5, y=21.5-27)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24)
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5)
- Small electric poles connecting power to the grid

### Research Lab Network
Multiple labs connected to electricity network ID 37356:
- Several labs with automation and logistic science packs
- Some labs currently empty
- Two labs without power connection

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has sufficient coal fuel supply before it runs out
- Connect all labs to the power network to avoid NO_POWER status

### Assembly Line Resource Management
- Verify all required ingredients (iron plate, iron gear wheel, electronic circuit) are available before starting assembly
- Keep input chest stocked with components to avoid production interruptions

### Crafting Prerequisites
- Cannot craft iron gear wheels directly - need to smelt iron plates first
- Ensure proper crafting sequence: ore → plates → intermediate products → final products

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory has required items before attempting to insert into machines/chests
- Maintain adequate coal supply for burner inserters and boilers

### Production Chain Dependencies
- Electronic circuits require both iron plates and copper cables
- Plan production to maintain steady supply of base materials (iron/copper plates)
